tweet: Gearing up for a shoestring launch!
We've launched! http://voteforpoetry.com Cash prizes awarded starting May 1st.  Enter your work to win!
It's still early in the month.  A strong poem can win the April prize.  The more you vote, the more your poems get voted.
There was a bug keeping the Vote buttons from working for new poems.  It's been fixed.  Also made the results look better.
